title: Fix 11 failing integration tests (json-output, cli)
description: 11 tests fail in src/commands/__tests__/json-output.test.ts and tests/cli.test.ts. They use execSync('node dist/cli.js ...') which requires a build step. Fix: either add a beforeAll build hook or fix the test setup. Run npm test to verify all 238 tests pass.
acceptance_criteria: All 238+ tests pass with npm test on a clean checkout (no prior build needed).
